nodes.text: Ektra, which was also known as Ektra City, was one of many cities of the planet Metellos, and was one of the many floating cities found just above the surface of the planet.

It was located above the Moridebo District. In 44 BBY, Jedi Master Plo Koon apprehended the criminal Dreed Pommel, who had taken a young five-year-old girl named Claria Labreezle hostage, in Labreezle's family's suite in Ektra.
